create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Sturdy Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Sturdy Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Brass or Sturdy Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Sturdy Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Brass or Sturdy Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.shaft_casing.text_1: Brass or Sturdy Casing can be used to decorate Shafts
item.create.blaze_cake.tooltip.summary: A powerful fuel for use in an _Advanced Forge_
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_1: Advanced Forges can provide Heat to Items processed in a Basin
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_2: For this, the Forge has to be fed with flammable items
create.ponder.blaze_burner.text_3: Using Coke as a fuel, the Forge can reach an even stronger level of heat
create.ponder.mechanical_mixer.text_3: Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Charcoal Forge or Advanced Forge
create.ponder.mechanical_press_compactin: Some of those recipes may require the heat of a Charcoal Forge or Advanced Forge
create.ponder.steam_engine.text_6: With the help of Advanced Forges, the power output can be increased
create.ponder.train_schedule.text_4: Any mob sitting in front of Train Controls is an eligible conductor. Advanced Forges also work for automatic operation.
